statements: SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_genes FROM Genes;
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM Genes WHERE expression_level < 0.3
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE gene_sequence LIKE '%AGT%' ORDER BY expression_level ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gene_name) FROM Genes
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressions;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressions JOIN GeneRegulationPatterns ON GeneExpressions.gene_id = GeneRegulationPatterns.gene_id;
SELECT gene_name, pattern_description FROM GeneRegulationPatterns WHERE regulatory_factor = 'TF';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions WHERE gene_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND expression_level BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY expression_level ASC
SELECT MAX(expression_level) AS max_expression FROM GeneExpressions WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT gene_id, regulatory_factor FROM GeneRegulationPatterns WHERE gene_id = 1 OR gene_id = 2 ORDER BY regulatory_factor DESC, gene_id ASC
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM GeneRegulationPatterns WHERE regulatory_factor = 'Activator' OR regulatory_factor = 'Repressor' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE regulation_type = 'upregulation' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expressions WHERE expression_level < 0.5 ORDER BY gene_id, experiment_id ASC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE regulation_type = 'downregulation' AND expression_level BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE '%ABCD%' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;

SELECT gene_name, experiment_date, tissue_type, technique FROM genes INNER JOIN gene_expressions ON genes.gene_id = gene_expressions.gene_id INNER JOIN experiments ON gene_expressions.experiment_id = experiments.experiment_id;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, tissue_type FROM genes INNER JOIN gene_expressions ON genes.gene_id = gene_expressions.gene_id INNER JOIN experiments ON gene_expressions.experiment_id = experiments.experiment_id WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, regulation_type, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM genes GROUP BY regulation_type HAVING COUNT(gene_id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_expression DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_data;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_data WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, tissue_type FROM sample_data WHERE tissue_type = 'Brain';
SELECT * FROM regulation_data ORDER BY gene_id DESC, regulation_id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id, regulation_id, experiment_date FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_data WHERE expression_level >= 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, tissue_type FROM gene_data JOIN regulation_data ON gene_data.gene_id = regulation_data.gene_id JOIN sample_data ON regulation_data.regulator_gene_id = sample_data.sample_id WHERE regulation_type = 'Activation' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, tissue_type FROM gene_data JOIN regulation_data ON gene_data.gene_id = regulation_data.gene_id JOIN sample_data ON regulation_data.regulator_gene_id = sample_data.sample_id JOIN experiment_data ON regulation_data.regulation_id = experiment_data.regulation_id WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT regulator_gene_id, COUNT(gene_id) AS gene_count FROM regulation_data GROUP BY regulator_gene_id HAVING COUNT(gene_id) > 1 ORDER BY gene_count DESC;
SELECT gene_name, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM gene_data GROUP BY gene_name HAVING AVG(expression_level) > 0.3 ORDER BY average_expression DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneList;
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM GeneList ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_type FROM GeneList WHERE gene_type = 'protein';
SELECT * FROM ExpressionLevels WHERE expression_level > 5.0;
SELECT GeneList.gene_name, ExpressionLevels.expression_level FROM GeneList JOIN ExpressionLevels ON GeneList.gene_id = ExpressionLevels.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneList;
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM GeneList ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, expression_level FROM SampleAnnotations JOIN ExpressionLevels ON SampleAnnotations.sample_id = ExpressionLevels.sample_id;
SELECT gene_name, regulation_type FROM GeneList JOIN GeneRegulationPatterns ON GeneList.gene_id = GeneRegulationPatterns.gene_id WHERE regulation_type = 'Activation';
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, expression_level FROM SampleAnnotations WHERE tissue_type = 'Liver';
